caption: The image features a man riding a motorcycle, with a close-up view of him wearing a helmet. The image is accompanied by text that provides tips and tricks for safe motorcycle riding. The text includes "Wear Gloves", "Turn On Your Headlights", "Wear Your Shoes", "Wear Protective Clothing", "Wear Safety Helmet", and "Riding". The image is likely part of a promotional campaign or educational material for motorcycle safety.
original_title: Orange and Black Illustrated Riding Tips and Trick Instagram Story
